Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1026 Trees and Shrubs

1026.01Physical obstruction of sidewalks and streets. 1026.02Visual obstruction of sidewalks and streets. 1026.03Planting trees in tree lawns. 1026.04Trimming and removing dead or damaged vegetation. 1026.05Notice to correct. 1026.06Failure to cure. 1026.07Costs. 1026.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Assessments for tree planting or maintenance - see Ohio R.C. 727.001

Injuring vegetation - see GEN. OFF. 642.06

Weeds - see GEN. OFF. Ch. 678

Hedges - see P. & Z. 1270.47

Zoning regulations - see P. & Z. Ch. 1282
